sen.e: After his father, Mitsunori, passed away on New Year's day of 1409, he fought with his younger brother, Yoshitsura, over the succession.

sen.j: 持範には旧若狭国・三河国守護代で満範に滅ぼされた小笠原氏の残党が支持勢力として付いたらしいが、義貫側は幕府の支持も取り付け、結局和睦することになった。
sen.e: The remnants of the Ogasawara clan that were destroyed in Mikawa no kuni shugodai (provincial governor of Mikawa Province), the former Wakasa province is said to have taken Mochinori's side, however, Yoshitsura won support from the bakufu (Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) so they reconciled in the end.

It is said that the remnants of the Ogasawara clan that served as shugodai (provincial governor) of Mikawa and Wakasa Provinces and were destroyed by Mitsunori supported Mochinori; however, Yoshitsura won support from the bakufu and they reconciled in the end.
sen.cmt: 満範によってほろぼされた旧若狭国・三河国守護代の部分が正しく訳せていなかったので、修正しました。より自然な訳になるように左記のように変更しました。
sen.e: It is said that the remnants of the Ogasawara clan that served as shugodai (provincial governor) of Mikawa and Wakasa Provinces and were destroyed by Mitsunori supported Mochinori; however, Yoshitsura won support from the bakufu and they reconciled in the end.

sen.j: 『若狭国守護職次第』では和睦の時期を応永18年（1411年）6月の事とする。
sen.e: "Wakasa shugoshiki shidai" says that the reconciliation took placed in June 1411.

sen.j: ただし、和睦の結果、丹後国守護職は持範、若狭守護職には義貫がなったという『系図纂要』の記述は誤りで、持範は終生守護職に就くことなく終わった。
sen.e: However, as a result of reconciliation, "Keizu sanyo" which says that Mochinori held the post of Shugoshiki of Tango Province and Yoshitsura held the post of Shuhoshiki of Wakasa, is incorrect; Mochinori never held the post of Shugoshiki throughout his life.

According to "Keizu sanyo," Mochinori held the post of Shugoshiki of Tango Province and Yoshitsura held the post of Shugoshiki of Wakasa as a result of the reconciliation; however, this is incorrect and Mochinori had never held the post of Shugoshiki throughout his life.
sen.cmt: Shuhoshiki のミススペルを修正しました。より意味が明瞭になるように、左記のように変更しました。
sen.e: According to "Keizu sanyo," Mochinori held the post of Shugoshiki of Tango Province and Yoshitsura held the post of Shugoshiki of Wakasa as a result of the reconciliation; however, this is incorrect and Mochinori had never held the post of Shugoshiki throughout his life.

sen.j: 持範の系統は後年、室町幕府将軍直属軍である奉公衆となり、更に織田信長、豊臣秀吉に仕えた後、江戸幕府の旗本となった。
sen.e: Michinori's linage became a hokoshu (the shogunal military guard) which is a direct army of the shogun of the Muromachi bakufu, and became a hatamoto (direct retainers of the Edo bakufu (a form of Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun) after serving Nobunaga ODA and Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI..

sen.cmt: MichinoriをMochinoriに変更しました。Linageをlineageに変更しました。 江戸幕府に合わせて、室町幕府にtheをつけました。江戸幕府に説明がついていますが、この文脈には直接関係ないこと、室町幕府には同様の説明がついていないことから削除しました。
